title: ‘Wdgts’ app update adds interactive widgets to macOS Menu Bar
content:
Last year, the classic Wdgts app was completely rebuilt with new home screen widgets for iOS users and even a macOS version for the first time. Now the app has been updated with a new feature for Mac users: interactive widgets for the macOS Menu Bar.

more…

The post ‘Wdgts’ app update adds interactive widgets to macOS Menu Bar appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The Wdgts app has been updated with a new feature for Mac users: interactive widgets for the macOS Menu Bar.
